revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CC&C |model=WA2204 |revision= |asin= |fcc_date=06/14/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=Yes |availability=EoL |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PANWA2204 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=7.5 |pwr_amp=0.9 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8181;RTL8181, 39024T1 336B; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8181;RTL8181, 39024T1 336B; |wi1_chip2_brand=GRF |wi1_chip2_model=GRF5101;GRF5101, UT3260, 034025; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SB;RTL8305SB, 38012A1, 345D TAIWAN; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=MyWLAN |default_ssid_regex=^MyWLAN$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:02:72 |oui_eth=00:02:72 }} {{TagLine|WLAN Broadband Router}}
"10-015500-0B", "QEC 6AV0 94V0", and a date code of ''0401'' :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The default SSID for this device is presumed to be ''MyWLAN'' :- it's mentioned in the FCC manual.
The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a ''SPEC LIN'' :L4D-075090R (120VAC ~ 60Hz, 12.5W -> 7.5VDC, 0.9A).
